result.title: VERY Wrong Solution passed today'c div1 C
result.content: I'm on the phone right now and have no laptop, so sorry for the low quality post. But I wanted to say that my solution for problem C was to set a random food for each boy and then randomly change a boy's food until the second restriction was met. Surprisingly, this passed the system tests! Can anyone relate? Did anyone else have a wrong solution that passed? Weak testcases, or what happened?
